title: CSIR - CGCRI Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Project Associate I Posts
description: The Central Glass and Ceramic Research Institute (CGCRI) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Project Associate I Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech in Mechanical Engineering, and M.Sc., can apply for the CGCRI Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education deta...
